Author: realityisgone
Text: Thanks for this it made me feel a bit better xx im really really stressed about my exams and although theyre important i think i just needed to hear they arent thr end of the world.  Thanks for commenting :))

Author: depressedemobitchxx
Text: Hey, I understand things are tough right now, but please try to take care of yourself as best as you can 💕  First off, don’t sweat your exams. Yes, they may be important, but at the end of the day? It’s just an exam. Your mental health is worth much, much, more than getting a good grade on a piece of paper.   As for your binge, everyone slips up every once and a while. I know binges make everyone feel like shit, but please remember that one slip up does NOT make you a “failure.”   I know it sucks not being able to see your brother, or have a “good summer”, but I’m sort of in the same boat here. Please feel free to message me if you ever need it, I always relate to your posts and you seem like you are way too hard on yourself sometimes!   I know I’m just an internet stranger, but I hope I helped you a little bit, and I hope you feel better soon. Much love 💕
